name: HTMLCanvasElement.width
description: The HTMLCanvasElement.width property is a positive integer reflecting the width HTML attribute of the canvas element interpreted in CSS pixels. When the attribute is not specified, or if it is set to an invalid value, like a negative, the default value of 300 is used.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'HTMLCanvasElement.width' in HTML Living Standard.
